summary: THE FUEL TUBE ( HOSE ) CRACKED (SPLIT ) CAUSING A STRONG FUEL ODOR INSIDE AND OUTSIDE THE CAB.  THE CRACKED FUEL TUBE ( HOSE ) CAUSED POOR FUEL MILEAGE AND FUEL SPILLAGE WHEN RE-FUELED.  I HAD THE FUEL TUBE ( HOSE ) REPLACED BY LOCAL FORD DEALER AT MY EXPENSE.  THE DEALER TOLD ME IT WAS NOT A RECALL ITEM.  IT IS A VERY SERIOUS SAFETY MATTER.  *JB
